x-form-options.name: Developing a custom demo

x-form-options.description: For use when existing Red Hat Demo Platform assets do not meet your customer’s needs and you do not wish to develop your custom demo using AgnosticD/V; by developing a community demo, you agree to maintain the code in your own git repo.
